items.title: Crypto Is Losing Its ‘Speculative Trade’ Label Among Retail Traders – Here’s What They’re Focused On Instead
items.description: An ongoing Stocktwits poll shows half of retail traders now view crypto as protection against currency and geopolitical risks.

items.title: Nio Stock Rises Premarket: Chinese EV Maker Pushes Into Tesla Territory Down Under
items.description: The expansion adds two new right-hand drive markets to Nio’s global footprint.
